title: Intended Learning Outcomes (ILOs)-Based Mathematics Instructional Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical mathematics competency enhancement for working professionals to improve job efficiency

learning_goals: Learners can develop weekly learning plans based on Intended Learning Outcomes (ILOs) at the end of a lesson.
Learners can self-assess the degree of ILO achievement during mathematical problem-solving processes.
Learners can improve the clarity and measurability of ILOs through peer feedback.

resources: BYOD (Bring Your Own Device)-compatible software tools

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
